channel.title: Need help gettin' command line to work
channel.description:
The operating system i have is ubuntu the main.class is in /root/src/server the jar files are in /root/deps the command for run.sh is
[code]@echo off title Zion PvP java Dexter pause[/code]
i also have
[code]@echo off title Zion PvP Server java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]
plz help me get a workin command :D
